page.title: 02A Day In The Life
page.content: Vicky Blackhurst 11 yrs. I got up at 8.15 AM on Saturday, had a wash, went downstairs, lay on the sofa for about 10 minutes, then had breakfast which was a bowl of Frosties. At about 8.40 AM I got dressed in my riding clothes and cycled down to Carter's to see my pony. At 9.15 AM I turned him into the field to graze. I set to work mucking out his stable. After mucking out I brushed my yard in front of the stable. Then I went home for lunch. At 1.00 PM I went back to Carter's, groomed my horse then rode him. I took him down to the field to ride. Then I fed him and went home and had a bath at 8.00 PM. Between 8.00 and 11.00 PM I watched television, then I went to bed.
